title: UNINSTALLING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS - A comprehensive guide to my failure.

embed.description: Death, sorrow, and unspeakable sadness. Mi amore!

body:
After about 3 weeks of getting the, "Please re-install" error message when I tried to launch League, I decided to make a video detailing my adventures in trying to uninstall it.

*SPOILER ALERT*

I don't find out how to totally remove it.

I figured this would be a silly way of showing my problems, but if anyone can watch the video and find out what I did wrong, please, let me know. I really do want to solve this problem so I can cleanly reinstall and get back to playing. Thanks for the help!

replies.body: If your end goal is to get a clean uninstall to make sure no corrupted files are left on your system, try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Towards the bottoms, check the options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** and that should do the trick.
